body: The AI will always choose a value of 1 for X, with creatures that come into play with X +1/+1 counters eg. Shifting Wall, Ivy Elemental.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: AI and X Permanents
content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on February 12, 2014 08:28:40_

The AI will always choose a value of 1 for X, with creatures that come into play with X +1/+1 counters eg. Shifting Wall, Ivy Elemental.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=482_
